Name: Love is Dead
About the game: Reunite two freshly dead zombies as you scour the globe in search of the only thing that matters after the apocalypse, your beloved pets. With a whimsical, light-hearted approach to the zombie genre, Love is Dead is a fun and funny puzzle game for everyone that believes true love lasts forever... even beyond the grave. Successor to the hit 'i saw her' web game series. Play in single player or local co-op, for those with a friend or sweetie. Find secrets and collectibles in a world brimming with discovery. Beautifully bouncy art and music. Designed by Nick Yonge of Curiobot , creator of the i saw her series. Narration by Elspeth Eastman (League of Legends, Dead Island: Epidemic, Crypt of the NecroDancer, Torment: Tides of Numenera) with additional voices by Markus Spodzieja and Chad Knick Original soundtrack by dloot (Coin Crypt, Sentry Knight 2) with 2D art by Kateh May , and a 3D art team of Chris Vasquez , Xavier Garcia , and Fi Silva (3D talent behind Injustice 2, Mortal Kombat X, 100ft Robot Golf, Skullgirls, Steambirds: Alliance, Tasty Town, Heroes: Islands of Adventure, and others)
Meta Title: Love is Dead: May 31, 2018, Curiobot and Full Overview
